items.title: Circle’s Stock Falls To 3-Week Lows Amid Crypto Market Sell-Off
items.description: Stocktwits data showed that chatter around Circle’s stock increased 120% over 24 hours, as of Friday morning.

items.title: Micron Technology To Stop Selling Server Chips To China Data Centers: Report
items.description: According to a Reuters report, the move comes after the company failed to recover lost business in the wake of the ban and intensifying tech tensions ...

items.title: American Express CFO Sees 25% Higher Transaction Rates Among Millennial And Gen Z Cardholders
items.description: The company forecasts a 9% to 10% increase in 2025 revenue, up from the prior expectation of 8% to 10%.

items.title: VirnetX Stock Soars To 30-Month High Today: What’s Driving The Rally?
items.description: VirnetX announced that it had secured a General Services Administration (GSA) Multiple Award Schedule contract on Thursday.

items.title: Datadog Draws Wall Street’s Praise Ahead Of Q3 Earnings
items.description: TD Cowen raised its price target on Datadog to $180 from $175, noting that it anticipates third-quarter results surpassing guidance by roughly 23%.
